body.name: OQQ Women's 3 Piece High Waist Workout Shorts Butt Lifting Tummy Control Ruched Booty Smile Yoga Short Pants
features: Gusseted Crotch: Gusseted crotch for greater freedom of movement, Flatlock seams reduce irritation caused by chafing
Butt Lifting Designed: With crescent shading in the butt and ruched booty builder, easy to create peach hips
Comfortable High Waist: Wide-waist elastic waistband to cover navel which provide tummy control

Ultra-Stretch Fit: - Enough thickness with breathability, no See through, Featuring the soft and skin friendly material, the workout shorts are moisture wicking with four-way stretch material that promotes both compression and support.

For Daily Wear: 60% Nylon, 35% Polyester, 5% Spandex fabrics have a more natural feeling than polyester ones which makes it perfect for everyday wear,shopping, go out, badminton, running, jogging, cycling, gym fitness, marathon, game competiton or any casual exercise activities.
body.description: Comfortable and stylish yoga biker compression shorts deliver a fashion statement for your daily casual wear. Seamless tech help hug your curves nicely and provide better compression without the worry of possible irritation or chaffing on the insides of your thighs. COMPRESSION TIGHTS to protect against muscle trauma during training. Provide support to the upper leg muscles and reduce muscle vibrations. QUICK DRY COMFORTABLE DESIGN breathable and moisture wicking to keep sweat away and dry fast. Lightweight and elastic material, for increased comfort and a wide range of motion. Perfect option to Cross Training, Workouts, Weight Lifting, Tennis, Running, Walking, Fitness, Exercise, Yoga and competing in all-weather sports and activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bootylicious and Comfortable Workout Shorts!
reviews.reviewText: Ladies, if you're on a quest for workout shorts that make your booty look amazing, stay in place during runs, and feel like a second skin, look no further than the OQQ Women's 3 Piece High Waist Workout Shorts! These shorts have quickly become my go-to choice for all my fitness activities, and here's why:Booty-Boosting Magic: Let's talk about the most important feature first—how these shorts make your derrière look! It's like they've got a built-in "butt-lifting" spell. The ruched booty smile design gives your behind a natural, flattering lift that's seriously confidence-boosting. I've never felt so good in workout shorts before!Stay Put While Running: If you're tired of constantly tugging at your shorts during runs, these are a game-changer. The high waist and thoughtful design ensure they stay securely in place, even during intense sprints. Say goodbye to awkward adjustments mid-jog – you can focus on conquering your run!Seamless Comfort: I can't stress this enough – these shorts feel seamless! The fabric is incredibly soft and stretchy, molding to your body like a second skin. No more chafing or discomfort during your workouts. Whether you're doing yoga, HIIT, or just lounging around, these shorts provide ultimate comfort.Tummy Control Extraordinaire: The high waist not only keeps the shorts in place but also offers fantastic tummy control. It smooths out any lumps and bumps, giving you that extra confidence boost during your workouts or even when you're running errands in athleisure mode.Quality 3-Piece Set: The fact that you get three pairs of shorts in one package is an absolute steal. You can switch up your look whenever you want or have a fresh pair ready for your next sweaty adventure. The variety is a nice touch!Stylish and Versatile: These shorts are not just for workouts; they're super cute for casual wear too. The design is chic and trendy, so you can wear them to the gym, the grocery store, or even brunch with friends. Versatility at its finest!In conclusion, the OQQ Women's 3 Piece High Waist Workout Shorts are a game-changer in the world of activewear. They provide the perfect balance of style, functionality, and comfort. Not only do they make your booty look fabulous, but they also stay in place during runs, and the seamless feel is like a dream come true. Say goodbye to uncomfortable workout sessions and hello to confidence-boosting fitness fashion. These shorts are a must-have for every active woman's wardrobe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy fit, comfortable, breathable, noninvasive butt scrunch
reviews.reviewText: What more can I say, if you don’t want an obvious butt scrunch but want the option to opt out of the look without the shorts looking odd, these are your go-to. They come in many different colors but the colors match the pictures in person. The waist band is cinching which I love (some may not but I do), and the pants are so breathable. They’re also slightly moisture wicking up until a certain point, so I will say that if you sweat a lot in that area, eventually it will show. I don’t particularly mind it, but I know some people do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The wife loves the way they feel. The material, size and comfort, great for working out. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shapes you like a mofo
reviews.reviewText: These shorts are super cute! They fit perfect which I thought was odd on some reviews to size up, bc I’m thicker and wider on the bottom half and normally have issues on these things. The material is not what I thought it’d be considering the reviews saying it was compressing, but they’re kind of thin so def can see the line of your 🐱. I haven’t tested them on sweat proof but I have a feeling bc they’re so thin that they aren’t so good on that end. I also am disappointed bc I would have bought more just for lounging at home in, but the price went from $23 to $29 within a week of me buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Line Under Buttcheek? Rides up.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the pack with black, green, and gray. The gray have this crescent moon shape in the area right below the butt cheek that almost looks like smile from the Amazon logo. I don't know if it's supposed to give the appearance of a cleft, or lift, or what, but it isn't flattering. It's only really visible on the gray ones as it's a black print. Also, the legs ride up on the thigh easily so thighs may chaffe together when exercising. They are very stretchy and light/thin. But, you can't see through them. They are comfortable and great around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’4” and around 130-140 lbs. I usually get smalls but after looking at other reviews, I went up a size and got medium. The shorts were still pretty small, but I like my shorts tighter - I’d definitely recommend going up one size. These shorts are super cute and I love the butt lift lines. The lift lines don’t do much as far as lifting like other workout items do sometimes, but they do give the illusion. The butt lift line is kinda high though, so if you have a bigger butt, the lines might sit high on you. I got the pack I got because I liked the green color, but the black shorts are my least favorite. The black shorts make it hard to see anything and everything just kinda blends in/you look like you have no butt 😂 overall really happy with my purchase, would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 🍑 Elevate your workout style with OQQ Women's 3 Piece High Waist Workout Shorts! These shorts feature butt lifting, tummy control, and ruched booty design for a flattering fit. Embrace the blend of fashion and functionality in this set, providing confidence and comfort during your exercise routine. 💪👟 #OQQWorkoutShorts #FitnessFashion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It makes a good body contour but the pink one is very sheer that you can see even the color of the underwear but the black and gray are great! It’s too short for me but it’s comfortable enough to use at home or with oversized shirt or dresses
Llegarán a tiempo y son super cómodos y no se transparente si compras tu talla
I dp like this brand, but there's no scrunch in the bum as described. It's just a thick line going down the center, unlike their scrunch bum leggings I have. Squat proof, but the waist do fold down.
